name: Cleopas R. Johnson Park
description: Cleopas Johnson Park is a medium sized park that rests between castleberry Hill and the AUC. The park was renovated in 2011 and includes 2 tennis courts, a basketball court, and a playground.
parking: The park has a small Parking lot off Atlanta Student Movement Blvd. On Larkin St there is free parking on Sunday on the park-side of the street. 2 hour parking on the south side of the street.
